categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, the Rebel Alliance launched an assault on Vivonah. Years later, during the time of peace in the New Republic, Senator Ransolm Casterfo used it as an example of the so-called terrorist tactics used by the Rebels.
The assault on Vivonah was first mentioned in Claudia Gray's 2016 canon novel Bloodline.
